CustomField.description: DEPRECATED-Prevents the scheduling of the nightly update to Recurring Donations. Any existing scheduled job will need to be removed through Setup->Monitoring->Scheduled Jobs
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Prevents the scheduling of the nightly update to Recurring Donations. Any existing scheduled job will need to be removed through Setup->Monitoring->Scheduled Jobs
CustomField.label: DEPRECATED-Disable Sched of Nightly Job
